summary: The class implements a Laplacian filter operator that convolves a configurable kernel across each channel of a 4‑dimensional tensor (batch, channel, height, width). It handles padding according to the selected border mode and can optionally normalize the kernel, returning a tensor of the same shape.
business_intent: Enable easy application of Laplacian‑based smoothing or edge‑enhancement in neural network pipelines, facilitating preprocessing, feature extraction, or regularization for image‑like data.
